ProductInfo.Features:
Gorgeous appearance: 10 inch HD display with 1024x600 resolutions; 5-point TFT capacitive touch screen
The newest, most popular and hottest system: Android 4.2.1 Jelly Bean operating system
Supports 1080p HD play, HDMI output (Cable sold separately), G-sensor and 3D games
Ultra-thin and fashionable design
Storage: It is 8 GB of built-in storage, but you're free to expand that storage capability by up to 32 GB TF card ( micro SD memory card). Simply slide an TF card in and enjoy photo slideshows, music playback, and even video playback!
ProductInfo.Name: Shamo's New 10.1 Inch Tablet Pc Dual Core Google Android 4.2 8gb 10 Inch 1gb RAM Hdmi
